characters.name: Shigeo Kageyama
characters.description:
**Height:** 157 cm

He is the assistant and disciple of Arataka Reigen. He is also the newest member of the Body Improvement Club.
Shigeo is a quiet and polite individual who tries to live a normal life despite having strong telepathic power, he wants to be seen as a good human among the people in his social life. This often makes him naive and gullible when those with malicious intent want to use him for a laugh or to cause trouble but Shigeo has very strong beliefs to never use his powers to hurt another person because of an altercation he faced once as a child.

characters.name: Arataka Reigen
characters.description:
__Height:__ 179 cm (5'10.5")

Mob's mentor and boss in the Mob Psycho 100 series. He owns a business exorcising ghosts and is a self-proclaimed psychic. 

He is Mob's moral compass. He was the first person to ever consider Mob as normal and his teachings have never failed Mob.

characters.name: Ekubo
characters.description:
Ekubo is a self-proclaimed upper-class evil spirit who has aligned himself with Mob after being defeated by him.

Ekubo wants to be a god. Specifically, he wants to be worshipped by all humanity. 
~!Despite having that kind of ego, he didn't hesitate to put himself at Mob's mercy in the hopes of using the boy to his advantage. At first, he wanted to steal Mob's body and use it to become a god, but he eventually decided to try to make Mob a god instead.!~

characters.name: Ritsu Kageyama
characters.description:
__Height:__ 159.4 cm

Ritsu is very clever and apparently serious, he also serves on the student council and excels in academics and everything else he tries. None of that matters to him as much as psychic power, however, his brother is more important to him than anyone or anything else.

~!Before he awoke his own psychic powers, he longed for the esper abilities his brother has always had and was frustrated by his own inability to do things like bend spoons. He may have a habit of carrying spoons around with him, for bending purposes. He is a perfectionist with a not-so-hidden dark side. Unlike Mob, he finds it okay to use psychic violence against people when necessary.!~

characters.name: Tenga Onigawara
characters.description: Tenga Onigawara is the leader of Salt Middle School and an unofficial member of the Body Improvement Club.

characters.name: Tome Kurata
characters.description:
__School:__ Salt Middle School
__School club: __Telepathy Club (President)

Tome seems to be a slacker but is passionate about the possibility of using telepathy to contact extraterrestrials. However, when the Telepathy Club's research into the matter bears no results, she quickly gives up. When she learns that Mob is an Esper, her passion is revitalized.

characters.name: Teruki Hanazawa
characters.description:
__Height:__ 161.4 cm

Hanazawa Teruki is an esper who was first introduced as an antagonist, but later became Mob's friend after being defeated by him. He was the shadow leader (urabanchou) of Black Vinegar Middle School, using his psychic powers to rule over the delinquents at his own school, as well as to defeat those from other schools.

Teruki is a talented, quick-thinking, and hardworking esper. In terms of raw power, he is nowhere near Mob's level, but he compensates for this by putting in effort and training diligently. He is able to analyze other espers' techniques and their weaknesses in a short amount of time, and often incorporates said techniques in his own fights. He is constantly training to improve himself, and is remarked by various espers as possessing a keen and powerful set of skills.

characters.name: Ichi Mezato
characters.description: Ichi Mezato is a  school girl who goes to Salt Middle School and is part of the News Club.  She is in class 2-1.

characters.name: Takane Tsubomi
characters.description:
She is a middle schooler at Salt Middle School. Mob harbors a large crush on her.

~!Most of what we know about Tsubomi's personality in the manga is from what Mob and other characters say about her. However, in the anime adaptation, there are extra scenes of Tsubomi that add to her character and personality and make her a more compassionate individual.!~

characters.name: Shou Suzuki
characters.description: ~!Sho Suzuki is the son of the leader of Claw. He led a direct resistance against his father's world domination plan.!~

characters.name: Musashi Gouda
characters.description: Musashi Goda is a student of Salt Middle School and the Body Improvement Club's President. Musashi has a strong sense of justice but strongly disagrees with senseless violence

characters.name: Gou Asahi
characters.description: Gou is an esper and one of the children who was invited to the Awakening Lab.

characters.name: Rei Kurosaki
characters.description: Rei is an esper and one of the children who was invited to the Awakening Lab

characters.description: Takeshi is an esper and one of the children who was invited to the Awakening Lab

characters.name: Matsuo
characters.description: Matsuo is an esper and a former member of Claw. He was part of the upper echelon called "Scar".

characters.name: Yusuke  Sakurai
characters.description: The partner of Koyama who is also one of the executives of the Tsume group.

characters.name: Ishiguro
characters.description: The chief of the seventh branch of Tsume.
